# Ribbon
```import { Ribbon } from "@elevenia/master-ui/Components/Atom";```

Ribbon component gives an information about status or condition that occurs.

<Story id="atom-ribbon--ribbon-success" />


## Utils Props

There's no specific utility props for this component

## Component Props
<Props of={Ribbon} />

### type

There are three type. Use `type` prop to assign ribbon type.<br />
